attributes.action: We are looking to make school buses safer to travel on !
attributes.additional_details: We would like to see buses have conductors , more buses running , safety measures in place for covid 19 , children should be given safe travel .
attributes.background: We need to make our school buses safer to travel on , no more over crowding , monitored behaviours , children have the right for safe travel to and from school . Even more so in covid , we are made to put our children on this service to get them to and throw school but not at the cost of a life !

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for local councils.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
